House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain paper products and synthetic detergents.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to lower the rate of duty on certain toilet paper and handkerchiefs. Increases the duty on certain synthetic detergents. Grants duty-free treatment to other types of detergents.

titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain paper products and synthetic detergents.
